articles.description: Follow live text and 5 Live commentary as England travel to face Finland in the Nations League.
articles.title: England vs Finland: Lee Carsley wants reaction from Three Lions after Nations League Greece defeat

articles.description: India face Australia in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium, Sharjah – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: India vs Australia LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Follow live NFL updates, scores and news as the Jacksonville Jaguars face the Chicago Bears at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London.
articles.title: NFL London games live: Jacksonville Jaguars v Chicago Bears - live updates, scores, news and analysis

articles.description: Chicago’s rookie quarterback Caleb Williams puts on a show in London as he leads the Bears to a 35-16 win over the Jacksonville Jaguars on Sunday.
articles.title: NFL London: Caleb Williams stars as Chicago Bears beat Jacksonville Jaguars 35-16

articles.description: Maia Bouchier's classy unbeaten 62 helps England move a step closer to the semi-finals of the Women's T20 World Cup with a 10-wicket win over Scotland.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: England thrash Scotland by 10 wickets

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes looks set to be fit for a second Test against Pakistan that seems likely to be played on the same Multan pitch as the record-breaking first Test.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes set to be fit, same Multan pitch in line to be used

articles.description: Novak Djokovic misses the opportunity to claim the 100th title of his stellar career as Jannik Sinner wins a high-quality Shanghai Masters final.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic loses to Jannik Sinner in Shanghai Masters final

articles.description: England fight back in the second half to overcome an impressive Canada in Vancouver and retain their WXV1 title.
articles.title: Canada 12-21 England: Red Roses retain WXV title

articles.description: Khadija Shaw scores stoppage-time winner for Manchester City as they beat Liverpool to move level on points with WSL leaders Chelsea.
articles.title: Liverpool 1-2 Manchester City: Khadija Shaw scores twice in comeback win

articles.description: Harlequins produce a monumental defensive effort to overcome Saracens at The Stoop and end a run of eight straight derby defeats.
articles.title: Premiership: Harlequins 17-10 Saracens - Quins end derby drought
